DOC.brief_summary: This open label , non-interventional study show efficacy Pulmicort®Respules® cough variant asthma patient age 5-year old young outpatient department
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Study Cough Variant Asthma Treatment With Pulmicort®Respules® Children Outpatients
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Patient prescribe Pulmicort® Respules® accord physician 's judgement , irrespective inclusion study . The usage Pulmicort® Respules® follow local authorised package insert . Allergy ingredient Pulmicort® Respules® With history Leukotriene Modifier ( LM ) usage prior 2 week recruitment follow plan . Have use systemic/inhaled steroid prior 2 week recruitment
